original_text: But when the sun rose, it burned the young plants. They soon died because they had not grown down well into the soil.
korean_text: 해가 돋은 후에 타서 뿌리가 없으므로 말랐고

sentences.original_text: because they had not grown down well into the soil
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그것들이 토양 속으로 잘 뿌리내리지 못했기 때문이다
